content.question: The notation given is correct but the performance includes an error. In which location does the performer make inappropriate use of the tonic 64 chord?

unit.text: 5: Harmony and Voice Leading II - Chord Progressions and Predominant Function

skill.text: Skill 3.E: Apply knowledge of musical symbols and terms to detect discrepancies in pitch and rhythm when comparing notated and performed music in one or two voices.
